name: Critical Zone
description:
There are other rulers sitting on your planet? Time to intervene!

In this local couch brawler, you and up to three friends take on the role of a ruler in order to control the planets. In order to achieve this goal, however, your fellow combatants must leave the planet - one way or another. Each of the planets will react differently during your battle. Secure the last place on our shrinking Earth, be the only one to survive the fast ride on Mercury and be the last one to not get confused on dusty Mars - because the magnificent crown only fits on one head.



  • Choose from over 20 historically influential figures.
  • Fight on 11 planets with different gameplay mechanics.
  • Play with up to 3 friends.
  • Become the number one ruler in your living room.
